title: Brand and Model Recognition in Product Titles
tech-stack: Python, NLP, RNN, TensorFlow, Flair, spaCy, NER, BI-LSTM-CRF
description: A project focused on recognizing brand and model names in product titles using data from ABO. Implemented using advanced NLP techniques and machine learning models.

title: Shader: Iridescence of Oil on Water
description: A shader that simulates the iridescence of oil on water, adjusting based on oil density, view angle, and light intensity.

title: Laboratory Management System & VLE
tech-stack: Debian, PHP, Laravel, MariaDB, JS, Git
description: A comprehensive system for managing laboratory operations and virtual learning environments, developed using PHP and Laravel.

title: Symbolic Execution for C Programs
description: A compiler feature that uses symbolic execution to verify multiple paths of C programs, ensuring code reliability and correctness.

title: Blind Dating Web App
tech-stack: Ubuntu, MongoDB, Node.js, Express, Git, JS, HTML/CSS
description: A web application for blind dating, built with a robust backend and a user-friendly interface. Deployed on an Ubuntu server.

title: TestDriveLiveTv Website
description: A dynamic website for live test drives, built with Next.js for server-side rendering, Express.js for the backend, MySQL for database management, and Tailwind CSS for styling.
